description: Many Wii U video games contain a digital copy of the game's manual. These copies are saved as BFMA files. BFMA files are compressed archives that contain .XML and .ARC files. They may also be related to .SARC files.
NOTE: Most Wii U game manuals are also available to download online as .PDF files.

common_filenames.description: manual.bfma - The name of Wii U game manual files.
